sentence: Biden to Mehmet Oz, Herschel Walker: Resign or be fired from presidential board.
author: Nicole Fallert
title: 100,000 refugees

sentence: I didnt choose a top picture for this commentary of Herschel Walker, Tim Scott, Clarence Thomas, or any of the other current quislings of color supported by the right, because even looking at them makes me bilious.
title: Black Kos, Tuesdays Chile: All my skinfolk aint my kinfolk We see you Thomas, Scott, and Walker.
